abstract: Visa hired Joseph W. Saunders to find a chief executive for the company as it prepares for an initial public offering and he found — drum roll, please — himself.
lead_paragraph: Visa hired Joseph W. Saunders to find a chief executive for the company as it prepares for an initial public offering and he found — drum roll, please — himself.

headline.main: Visa Names Chief Ahead of I.P.O.
